name: VIR-273.02 Verify that the list of colors are shown as the check boxes within Categories section for the Business Unit permission

userStory.narrative:
As a Chief shopper, I require the ability to manage the colors
that each school will be able to view and purchase on the shop.virco
so that I can control the consistency for the school.

title: VIR-273.02 Verify that the list of colors are shown as the check boxes within Categories section for the Business Unit permission
